page.title: 10PORTADOWN TECHNICAL COLLEGE.
page.content: {Portadown Technical College}has a staff of {105}and around{1000}day school students. There are seven main departments;{ {Construction,Engineering,Science,Home {Economics,General Studies,Languages {and Commerce. In{1985}the{Home Economics Department} and the{Science Department}will combine under one department{Science. The college caters for pupils from Portadown and the surrounding area.The age of the students who attend ranges from 14 to 18 years. The college also caters for adult education through day-release courses and evening classes.The classes cover a wide range of subjects which include cookery,pottery,commercial subjects,maths and english.
